title: Putting the IP in RIP Pt. I with Trey Kerby
description:
Dynasties aren’t built overnight. Committing to excellence is a full-time job. When we all lock in, we win. Jimmy and Larry know this which is why they are dialing in the literal big homie, Trey Kerby of The Athletic’s No Dunks, for the only dance that matters. Come on and slam, and welcome to the jam on OG Throwing Fits standom, flow team politics, going from the hardwood to the boardroom, the show’s first ever step check, sticking to the classics, quarantine footwear rotations, his sneaker Mount Rushmore, defending Michael Jordan’s propensity for dressing like an asshole, contextualizing tunnel fits, the most swagged out athletes of all time, Lebronception, residing in the beating heart of hip-hop and much more.
 
For more Throwing Fits, check us out on Patreon: www.patreon.com/throwingfits.
dc:creator: Throwing Fits
